topics.body:
I wouldn't mind living in space for the rest of my life.
But it needs to have artificial gravity and toilet seat warmers.
Also, lots of space to move around.

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d1c07263687273c8750000#post_54d1c07263687273c8750000
[bq="Silent_Witness"]So... WataMote. Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui. It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular. I know precious little about this series, but I have to admit that it caught my eye. So for anyone who's seen it, I need to ask: how is it?

[spoiler]Also, it has a dub? I had no idea. I'll probably watch the subbed version first, though.[/spoiler][/bq]
Watamote is good, in my opinion, and it seems a lot of people identifies a lot with the character (you will see why).
It has good humor and good episodes. Is very interesting, in my opinion.

9/10

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d20cd96368725254280000#post_54d20cd96368725254280000
Thanks to Gravity, my desires to live in spaces vanished.
I will go crazy if I live there for few months.

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d20aed63687274914f0500#post_54d20aed63687274914f0500
I had fear of the first zombie in RE1 or in any Resident Evil game.
I needed the help of my brother or cousin to beat the entire games.
